ADB.BK.summary: Applied DB Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes plastic compounds, adhesives, and sealants in Thailand, Nigeria, Kenya, Vietnam, Myanmar, Bangladesh, and internationally. It operates through three segments: Plastic Compound, Adhesive, and Silicone and Sealant. The company's plastic compound products include PVC and non-PVC compounds, such as soft PVC, rigid PVC, pharmaceutical grade, and thermoplastic elastomer compounds, as well as PP split yarn for wire and cable fillers. Its adhesive products comprise contact, grafted, PU, vinyl, and emulsion latex water-based adhesives, as well as thinners, primers, and hardeners. The company's sealant products include acetic silicone, neutral silicone, acrylic, super nail construction, PU, and spur polymer hybrid sealants. It also offers DIY products comprising super glues, RTV gasket makers, household adhesive and sealants, epoxy adhesive and putties, and specialist products. The company provides its products to wire and cable, real estate and construction, and shoes and leather industries, as well as household end-users. Applied DB Public Company Limited was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Mueang Samut Prakan, Thailand.

BCT.BK.summary: Birla Carbon (Thailand) Public Company Limited manufactures and sells carbon black under the Birla Carbon, Raven, and Conductex brands in Thailand, Japan, Indonesia, Vietnam, Malaysia, the Philippines, China, Korea, Taiwan, Australia, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Thai Carbon Black Public Company Limited and changed its name to Birla Carbon (Thailand) Public Company Limited in July 2018. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

CMAN-R.BK.summary: Chememan Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes mineral lime and chemical products in Thailand. The company's products include quicklime, hydrated lime, and limestone and grinded limestone. Its lime products are used in industrial, agricultural, environmental, and household applications. The company also provides dump and tank trucks transportation services, as well as technical support services. It also exports its products. The company was incorporated in 2003 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

CMAN.BK.summary: Chememan Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes mineral lime and chemical products in Thailand. The company's products include quicklime, hydrated lime, and limestone and grinded limestone. Its lime products are used in industrial, agricultural, environmental, and household applications. The company also provides dump and tank trucks transportation services, as well as technical support services. It also exports its products. The company was incorporated in 2003 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

COLOR-R.BK.summary: Salee Colour Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes pigment pellets and pigment powders in Thailand. The company offers black masterbatch products for use in engineering and polyolefin resins; white masterbatch products for applications in a range of carrier resins; and filler masterbatch products for use in polyolefin resins. It also provides additive masterbatch products, including anti-oxidants, anti-statics, anti-microbials, fragrances, non-halogen flame retardants, processing aids, slip-agents, anti-blocks, UV stabilizers, etc. for applications in the construction, textile and fiber, agriculture, food and industrial packaging, electronic appliance, automotive, and enhancing recycle article areas. In addition, the company offers custom color masterbatch products and bioplastic compounds, as well as compounding and laboratory testing services. It also exports its products. Salee Colour Public Company Limited was founded in 2003 and is based in Mueang Samut Prakan, Thailand.

COLOR.BK.summary: Salee Colour Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes pigment pellets and pigment powders in Thailand. The company offers black masterbatch products for use in engineering and polyolefin resins; white masterbatch products for applications in a range of carrier resins; and filler masterbatch products for use in polyolefin resins. It also provides additive masterbatch products, including anti-oxidants, anti-statics, anti-microbials, fragrances, non-halogen flame retardants, processing aids, slip-agents, anti-blocks, UV stabilizers, etc. for applications in the construction, textile and fiber, agriculture, food and industrial packaging, electronic appliance, automotive, and enhancing recycle article areas. In addition, the company offers custom color masterbatch products and bioplastic compounds, as well as compounding and laboratory testing services. It also exports its products. Salee Colour Public Company Limited was founded in 2003 and is based in Mueang Samut Prakan, Thailand.

DIMET-R.BK.summary: Dimet (Siam) Public Company Limited manufactures and sells coating products in Thailand. It operates through four segments: Manufacturing and Sale of Coating Products, Construction Work, Sale of Construction Supplies, and Maintenance Services of Solar Farm and Others. The company also provides painting, construction, and hot dip galvanized services. In addition, it is involved in the provision of testing and calibration services for electrical and electronic equipment; distribution of thinners and steel towers; and generation, distribution, and transmission of electric power. The company was founded in 1982 and is based in Samut Prakan, Thailand.

DIMET.BK.summary: Dimet (Siam) Public Company Limited manufactures and sells coating products in Thailand. It operates through four segments: Manufacturing and Sale of Coating Products, Construction Work, Sale of Construction Supplies, and Maintenance Services of Solar Farm and Others. The company also provides painting, construction, and hot dip galvanized services. In addition, it is involved in the provision of testing and calibration services for electrical and electronic equipment; distribution of thinners and steel towers; and generation, distribution, and transmission of electric power. The company was founded in 1982 and is based in Samut Prakan, Thailand.

EASON-R.BK.summary: Eason & Co Public Company Limited manufactures and sells industrial and automotive paints primarily in Thailand. It offers packaging coatings for interior and exterior application to crown caps, ROPP, screw caps, lug caps, and other closures. The company also provides offset inks comprising metal decorating inks for 2-piece cans; and conventional and UV metal decorating inks for 3-piece cans. In addition, it offers motorcycle coatings, including poly urethane, acrylic, and air dry paints, as well as trades in industrial paints. The company was formerly known as Eason Paint Public Company Limited and changed its name to Eason & Co Public Company Limited in May 2020. Eason & Co Public Company Limited was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Phan Thong, Thailand.

EASON.BK.summary: Eason & Co Public Company Limited manufactures and sells industrial and automotive paints primarily in Thailand. It offers packaging coatings for interior and exterior application to crown caps, ROPP, screw caps, lug caps, and other closures. The company also provides offset inks comprising metal decorating inks for 2-piece cans; and conventional and UV metal decorating inks for 3-piece cans. In addition, it offers motorcycle coatings, including poly urethane, acrylic, and air dry paints, as well as trades in industrial paints. The company was formerly known as Eason Paint Public Company Limited and changed its name to Eason & Co Public Company Limited in May 2020. Eason & Co Public Company Limited was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Phan Thong, Thailand.

EPG.BK.long_name: Eastern Polymer Group Public Company Limited
EPG.BK.summary: Eastern Polymer Group Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in the rubber insulation, automotive and packaging plastics, and other businesses in Thailand and internationally. It also manufactures bed liners and covers of pickup trucks, automotive accessories, plastic packaging, and rubber insulation products. In addition, the company is involved in the import and export of machinery and chemicals; manufacture of rubber for cars, machinery, buildings, and other products; assembly and distribution of molded plastic parts; and injection and molding of plastic parts. Further, it designs, manufactures, and trades in accessories for 2, 4WD, light commercial, and heavy transportation vehicles, as well as provides research and development, and calibration services. The company was formerly known as Eastern Polymer Industry Company Limited. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Mueang Samut Prakan, Thailand. Eastern Polymer Group Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Vitoorapakorn Holding Co., Ltd.

GC-R.BK.summary: Global Connections Public Company Limited engages in the wholesale of plastic and plastic-related products in Thailand. It offers commodity polymers used in various plastic products; specialty and engineering polymers for use in engineering plastics/industrial products; and specialty chemicals and intermediates used in additives and adhesives, petrochemicals, and industrial cleaning applications. The company also produces and distributes solar power installed on roof. Global Connections Public Company Limited was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Bang Phli, Thailand.

GC.BK.summary: Global Connections Public Company Limited engages in the wholesale of plastic and plastic-related products in Thailand. It offers commodity polymers used in various plastic products; specialty and engineering polymers for use in engineering plastics/industrial products; and specialty chemicals and intermediates used in additives and adhesives, petrochemicals, and industrial cleaning applications. The company also produces and distributes solar power installed on roof. Global Connections Public Company Limited was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Bang Phli, Thailand.

GIFT-R.BK.summary: Gratitude Infinite Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, supplies and distributes chemical products in Thailand. It also produces and distributes supplementary health food; and sells oil-refinery and power plant equipment, pharmaceutical and medical products, fragrances and skincare-cosmetic products, and health supplements. The company was formerly known as Union Intraco Public Company Limited and changed its name to Gratitude Infinite Public Company Limited in December 2014. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Gratitude Infinite Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Union Petrochemical Public Company Limited.

GIFT.BK.summary: Gratitude Infinite Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, supplies and distributes chemical products in Thailand. It also produces and distributes supplementary health food; and sells oil-refinery and power plant equipment, pharmaceutical and medical products, fragrances and skincare-cosmetic products, and health supplements. The company was formerly known as Union Intraco Public Company Limited and changed its name to Gratitude Infinite Public Company Limited in December 2014. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Gratitude Infinite Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Union Petrochemical Public Company Limited.

MGT-R.BK.summary: Megachem (Thailand) Public Company Limited engages in the distribution of specialty chemicals in Thailand. The company offers performance coating products; polymers and advanced polymer composite products; surface technology products; oil and gas related products; and lifestyle biotech products. It also operates in Australia, China, India, Indonesia, Malaysia, the Philippines, the United Arab Emirates, Singapore, Vietnam, and England. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

MGT.BK.summary: Megachem (Thailand) Public Company Limited engages in the distribution of specialty chemicals in Thailand. The company offers performance coating products; polymers and advanced polymer composite products; surface technology products; oil and gas related products; and lifestyle biotech products. It also operates in Australia, China, India, Indonesia, Malaysia, the Philippines, the United Arab Emirates, Singapore, Vietnam, and England. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

NER-R.BK.long_name: North East Rubbers Public Company Limited
NER-R.BK.summary: North East Rubbers Public Company Limited engages in the manufacture and sale of rubber products in Thailand, China, Singapore, Hong Kong, Malaysia, and internationally. It provides ribbed smoked sheets, mixture rubbers, and standard Thai rubbers primarily for the automotive industry, as well as produces and sells electricity from biogas. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Prakhon Chai, Thailand.

NER.BK.long_name: North East Rubbers Public Company Limited
NER.BK.summary: North East Rubbers Public Company Limited engages in the manufacture and sale of rubber products in Thailand, China, Singapore, Hong Kong, Malaysia, and internationally. It provides ribbed smoked sheets, mixture rubbers, and standard Thai rubbers primarily for the automotive industry, as well as produces and sells electricity from biogas. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Prakhon Chai, Thailand.

PKW.F.summary: Polyplex (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes polyester films and chips, metalized films, extrusion coated films, cast polypropylene films, silicone coated films, and PET resins in Thailand and internationally. It offers Sarafil range of plastic films, such as BOPET, bi-oriented polypropylene, cast polypropylene, blown polypropylene, and sustainable films for use in packaging, electrical, industrial, pressure sensitive, and other applications. The company also provides Saracote range of silicone coated films, including silicone coated release liner-labels and specialty, shingle roofing tapes, release film liners, and silicone primer coated liners for use in labels, tapes, and roofing shingles, as well as in peel and stick underlayments. In addition, it offers Saralam range of extrusion coated film products comprising reflective insulation films; decorative lamination films; thin and thick gauge polyester thermal lamination films; and polypropylene, polyester, nylon, and UV polyester thermal lamination films for use in book covers, identity cards, carton lamination, wide format commercial films, etc. The company also manufactures and distributes recycled plastic products. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Polyplex (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Polyplex Corporation Limited.

PRAPAT-R.BK.summary: Peerapat Technology Public Company Limited engages in the research, development, manufacture, and distribution of cleaning chemicals under the PEERAPAT trademark in Thailand. The company provides laundry products, such as powder and water detergents, bleaching products, alkali additive products, degreasing products, water conditioning products, and fabric softener products; general cleaning and disinfectants; and kitchen detergents, such as utensil cleaning dry agents, etc., as well as imports and distributes automatic utensil washing machines under the STEWARD brand. It also distributes chemicals for automatic container washing machines; produces and distributes floor cleaning agents, such as general room floor, kitchen floor, bathroom floor, etc., as well as floor cleaning machines or equipment, and cleaning equipment; distributes household products through online channels; distributes swimming pool chemicals and equipment, as well as constructs and installs concrete and prefabricated swimming pools; and distributes energy-saving hot water heaters for use in the hospitality industry, such as hotels, resorts, hospitals, restaurants. In addition, the company provides contract manufacturing services for cleaning agents; manages food court and cafeteria; rents automatic container washer; provides swimming pool design, installation, and maintenance services; installs and repairs automatic container washing machines; provides cleaning equipment systems used in a range of food and beverage industries; and offers laundry and cleaning services in public and private hospitals, as well as sanitation cleaning services for food and beverage factories. The company was formerly known as Peerapat Chemical Industry Company Limited and changed its name to Peerapat Technology Public Company Limited in August 2008. Peerapat Technology Public Company Limited was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

PRAPAT.BK.summary: Peerapat Technology Public Company Limited engages in the research, development, manufacture, and distribution of cleaning chemicals under the PEERAPAT trademark in Thailand. The company provides laundry products, such as powder and water detergents, bleaching products, alkali additive products, degreasing products, water conditioning products, and fabric softener products; general cleaning and disinfectants; and kitchen detergents, such as utensil cleaning dry agents, etc., as well as imports and distributes automatic utensil washing machines under the STEWARD brand. It also distributes chemicals for automatic container washing machines; produces and distributes floor cleaning agents, such as general room floor, kitchen floor, bathroom floor, etc., as well as floor cleaning machines or equipment, and cleaning equipment; distributes household products through online channels; distributes swimming pool chemicals and equipment, as well as constructs and installs concrete and prefabricated swimming pools; and distributes energy-saving hot water heaters for use in the hospitality industry, such as hotels, resorts, hospitals, restaurants. In addition, the company provides contract manufacturing services for cleaning agents; manages food court and cafeteria; rents automatic container washer; provides swimming pool design, installation, and maintenance services; installs and repairs automatic container washing machines; provides cleaning equipment systems used in a range of food and beverage industries; and offers laundry and cleaning services in public and private hospitals, as well as sanitation cleaning services for food and beverage factories. The company was formerly known as Peerapat Chemical Industry Company Limited and changed its name to Peerapat Technology Public Company Limited in August 2008. Peerapat Technology Public Company Limited was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

PTL-R.BK.summary: Polyplex (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes polyester films and chips, metalized films, extrusion coated films, cast polypropylene films, silicone coated films, and PET resins in Thailand and internationally. It offers Sarafil range of plastic films, such as BOPET, bi-oriented polypropylene, cast polypropylene, blown polypropylene, and sustainable films for use in packaging, electrical, industrial, pressure sensitive, and other applications. The company also provides Saracote range of silicone coated films, including silicone coated release liner-labels and specialty, shingle roofing tapes, release film liners, and silicone primer coated liners for use in labels, tapes, and roofing shingles, as well as in peel and stick underlayments. In addition, it offers Saralam range of extrusion coated film products comprising reflective insulation films; decorative lamination films; thin and thick gauge polyester thermal lamination films; and polypropylene, polyester, nylon, and UV polyester thermal lamination films for use in book covers, identity cards, carton lamination, wide format commercial films, etc. The company also manufactures and distributes recycled plastic products. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Polyplex (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Polyplex Corporation Limited.

It offers Sarafil range of plastic films, such as BOPET, bi-oriented polypropylene, cast polypropylene, blown polypropylene, and sustainable films for use in packaging, electrical, industrial, pressure sensitive, and other applications. In addition, it offers Saralam range of extrusion coated film products comprising reflective insulation films; decorative lamination films; thin and thick gauge polyester thermal lamination films; and polypropylene, polyester, nylon, and UV polyester thermal lamination films for use in book covers, identity cards, carton lamination, wide format commercial films, etc. The company also manufactures and distributes recycled plastic products. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Polyplex (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Polyplex Corporation Limited.

SALEE-R.BK.summary: Salee Industry Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes plastic supplies, parts, tools, and equipment in Thailand and internationally. The company also provides label printing services; and manufactures and distributes molds, and household plastic and religious supplies. It serves electronic and automotive, food packaging, hard disk drive, and electronic parts packaging sectors. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Pathum Thani, Thailand.

SALEE.BK.summary: Salee Industry Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes plastic supplies, parts, tools, and equipment in Thailand and internationally. The company also provides label printing services; and manufactures and distributes molds, and household plastic and religious supplies. It serves electronic and automotive, food packaging, hard disk drive, and electronic parts packaging sectors. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Pathum Thani, Thailand.

SCC.BK.long_name: The Siam Cement Public Company Limited
SCC.BK.summary: The Siam Cement Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in cement, building materials, chemicals, packaging, and investment businesses in Thailand, Vietnam, Indonesia, China, and internationally. The company operates through Cement-Building Materials Business, Chemicals Business, Packaging Business, and Other segments. The Cement-Building Materials Business segment manufactures and sells grey cement, ready-mixed concrete, white cement, dry mortar, roof tiles, concrete paving blocks, ceramic tiles, and sanitary wares and fittings. It also distributes cement, building, and decorative products through distributors; and imports fuel products and waste paper. The Chemicals Business segment manufactures and sells olefins, polyolefins, and other chemical products. The Packaging Business segment manufactures and distributes paper and plastic packaging products, pulp, dissolving pulp, and printing and writing paper. The Other segment invests primarily in agricultural machines, automotive parts and components, and steel business, as well as other services. The company was founded in 1913 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SCVPY.long_name: The Siam Cement Public Company Limited
SCVPY.summary: The Siam Cement Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in cement, building materials, chemicals, packaging, and investment businesses in Thailand, Vietnam, Indonesia, China, and internationally. The company operates through Cement-Building Materials Business, Chemicals Business, Packaging Business, and Other segments. The Cement-Building Materials Business segment manufactures and sells grey cement, ready-mixed concrete, white cement, dry mortar, roof tiles, concrete paving blocks, ceramic tiles, and sanitary wares and fittings. It also distributes cement, building, and decorative products through distributors; and imports fuel products and waste paper. The Chemicals Business segment manufactures and sells olefins, polyolefins, and other chemical products. The Packaging Business segment manufactures and distributes paper and plastic packaging products, pulp, dissolving pulp, and printing and writing paper. The Other segment invests primarily in agricultural machines, automotive parts and components, and steel business, as well as other services. The company was founded in 1913 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SELIC-R.BK.summary: Selic Corp Public Company Limited produces and distributes industrial adhesives in Thailand. The company offers hot melt, water based, and solvent based adhesives; and services, such as sample testing, consultation, recommendation, production line audit, foundation training, and other services. It also produces and distributes self-adhesive labels; and wholesales industrial chemicals. The company serves various industries, such as leather and shoes, furniture, packaging and labelling, food and beverage, printing, woodworking, automotive parts, etc. It also exports its products to Asia, Africa, Australia, the Middle East, South America, and New Zealand. The company was founded in 1979 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

SELIC.BK.summary: Selic Corp Public Company Limited produces and distributes industrial adhesives in Thailand. The company offers hot melt, water based, and solvent based adhesives; and services, such as sample testing, consultation, recommendation, production line audit, foundation training, and other services. It also produces and distributes self-adhesive labels; and wholesales industrial chemicals. The company serves various industries, such as leather and shoes, furniture, packaging and labelling, food and beverage, printing, woodworking, automotive parts, etc. It also exports its products to Asia, Africa, Australia, the Middle East, South America, and New Zealand. The company was founded in 1979 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

SPG-R.BK.short_name: THE SIAM PAN GROUP PUBLIC COMPA
SPG-R.BK.long_name: Siam Pan Group Public Company Limited
SPG-R.BK.summary: Siam Pan Group Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes lubricating oils and greases, and automotive batteries in Thailand, Myanmar, and international. The company operates through three segments: Lubricating Oil, Grease, and Batteries. It offers lubricating oils for engines under the Trane, Deterla, and Super Star brands; lubricating greases for lubricating works under the Trane and Crocodile brands; and automotive batteries under the Boliden brand. The company is also involved in the manufacture and sale of plastic containers, caps, and lids. It also exports its products to Germany, Finland, Nigeria, Ghana, Gambia, Ethiopia, Lebanon, Dubai, Australia, New Zealand, Hong Kong, Singapore, Taiwan, Malaysia, Vietnam, Afghanistan, Sudan, Liberia, Angola, Myanmar, Indonesia, China, the Philippines, Bangladesh, Laos, Cambodia, and Burma. Siam Pan Group Public Company Limited is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SPG.BK.short_name: THE SIAM PAN GROUP PUBLIC COMPA
SPG.BK.long_name: Siam Pan Group Public Company Limited
SPG.BK.summary: Siam Pan Group Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes lubricating oils and greases, and automotive batteries in Thailand, Myanmar, and international. The company operates through three segments: Lubricating Oil, Grease, and Batteries. It offers lubricating oils for engines under the Trane, Deterla, and Super Star brands; lubricating greases for lubricating works under the Trane and Crocodile brands; and automotive batteries under the Boliden brand. The company is also involved in the manufacture and sale of plastic containers, caps, and lids. It also exports its products to Germany, Finland, Nigeria, Ghana, Gambia, Ethiopia, Lebanon, Dubai, Australia, New Zealand, Hong Kong, Singapore, Taiwan, Malaysia, Vietnam, Afghanistan, Sudan, Liberia, Angola, Myanmar, Indonesia, China, the Philippines, Bangladesh, Laos, Cambodia, and Burma. Siam Pan Group Public Company Limited is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

STGT-R.BK.long_name: Sri Trang Gloves (Thailand) Public Company Limited
STGT-R.BK.summary: Sri Trang Gloves (Thailand) Public Company Limited produces and sells rubber gloves in Singapore, Thailand, the United States, China, Germany, Japan, and internationally. It provides natural rubber powdered, natural rubber powderfree, and nitrile butadiene rubber gloves under the Satory, Finnx, and Sri Trang Gloves brand names for various applications, including healthcare and medical, as well as food processing, handling, manufacturing, and operations. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Hat Yai, Thailand. Sri Trang Gloves (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Sri Trang Agro-Industry Public Company Limited.

STGT.BK.long_name: Sri Trang Gloves (Thailand) Public Company Limited
STGT.BK.summary: Sri Trang Gloves (Thailand) Public Company Limited produces and sells rubber gloves in Singapore, Thailand, the United States, China, Germany, Japan, and internationally. It provides natural rubber powdered, natural rubber powderfree, and nitrile butadiene rubber gloves under the Satory, Finnx, and Sri Trang Gloves brand names for various applications, including healthcare and medical, as well as food processing, handling, manufacturing, and operations. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Hat Yai, Thailand. Sri Trang Gloves (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Sri Trang Agro-Industry Public Company Limited.

SWC-R.BK.summary: Sherwood Corporation (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes chemical products for household and industrial, agriculture, and public health applications in Thailand and internationally. It offers insecticides; wood preservatives; and cleaning, industrial, public health, agrochemical, and pet care products. The company also provides food products, such as milk and syrup. It offers its products under the Chaindrite, Chaingard, Stedfast, Vapona, Biforce, Fipforce, Imiforce, Teepol, and Mos Away brands. The company was formerly known as Sherwood Chemicals Public Company Limited and changed its name to Sherwood Corporation (Thailand) Public Company Limited in June 2018. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Sherwood Corporation (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of TOA Venture Holding Company Limited.

SWC.BK.summary: Sherwood Corporation (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes chemical products for household and industrial, agriculture, and public health applications in Thailand and internationally. It offers insecticides; wood preservatives; and cleaning, industrial, public health, agrochemical, and pet care products. The company also provides food products, such as milk and syrup. It offers its products under the Chaindrite, Chaingard, Stedfast, Vapona, Biforce, Fipforce, Imiforce, Teepol, and Mos Away brands. The company was formerly known as Sherwood Chemicals Public Company Limited and changed its name to Sherwood Corporation (Thailand) Public Company Limited in June 2018. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Sherwood Corporation (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of TOA Venture Holding Company Limited.

TCM1.F.long_name: The Siam Cement Public Company Limited
TCM1.F.summary: The Siam Cement Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in cement, building materials, chemicals, packaging, and investment businesses in Thailand, Vietnam, Indonesia, China, and internationally. The company operates through Cement-Building Materials Business, Chemicals Business, Packaging Business, and Other segments. The Cement-Building Materials Business segment manufactures and sells grey cement, ready-mixed concrete, white cement, dry mortar, roof tiles, concrete paving blocks, ceramic tiles, and sanitary wares and fittings. It also distributes cement, building, and decorative products through distributors; and imports fuel products and waste paper. The Chemicals Business segment manufactures and sells olefins, polyolefins, and other chemical products. The Packaging Business segment manufactures and distributes paper and plastic packaging products, pulp, dissolving pulp, and printing and writing paper. The Other segment invests primarily in agricultural machines, automotive parts and components, and steel business, as well as other services. The company was founded in 1913 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TMW-R.BK.summary: Thai Mitsuwa Public Company Limited manufactures and sells plastic and magnesium products in Thailand and internationally. The company offers plastic parts for use in automotive parts and home appliances; and magnesium parts that are used in automobiles, computers, mobile phones, cameras, etc. It also manufactures and trades in molds. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in Muang, Thailand. Thai Mitsuwa Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Mitsuwa Electric Industry Co., Ltd.

TMW.BK.summary: Thai Mitsuwa Public Company Limited manufactures and sells plastic and magnesium products in Thailand and internationally. The company offers plastic parts for use in automotive parts and home appliances; and magnesium parts that are used in automobiles, computers, mobile phones, cameras, etc. It also manufactures and trades in molds. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in Muang, Thailand. Thai Mitsuwa Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Mitsuwa Electric Industry Co., Ltd.

TOA.BK.summary: TOA Paint (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes paints and chemicals in Thailand, Vietnam, Laos, Myanmar, Cambodia, Indonesia, and Malaysia. The company offers construction chemicals, special paints, and hardware and power tools, as well as decorative, wood, and heavy duty coatings. TOA Paint (Thailand) Public Company Limited was founded in 1964 and is headquartered in Bang Sao Thong, Thailand.

TPA-R.BK.long_name: Thai Poly Acrylic Public Company Limited
TPA-R.BK.summary: Thai Poly Acrylic Public Company Limited engages in the manufacture and distribution of acrylic, acrylonitrile butadiene styrene, high impact polystyrene, and other extruded plastic sheets in Thailand and internationally. The company offers general purpose, impact modified cast, sanitary ware, magic color, and LED block acrylic sheets, as well as light management solutions and acrylic diffusion products. It also provides extruded products, including ABS/HI.PS sheets, HD and LDPE.Net, PMMA and PS pattern, and PVC boards, as well as polypropylene profiles/boards/corrugated sheets under the ComPlas, MODEN PLAS, MAGIC COLOR, MODEN GLAS, and SuperGlas brands. Thai Poly Acrylic Public Company Limited was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Sam Phran, Thailand.

TPA.BK.long_name: Thai Poly Acrylic Public Company Limited
TPA.BK.summary: Thai Poly Acrylic Public Company Limited engages in the manufacture and distribution of acrylic, acrylonitrile butadiene styrene, high impact polystyrene, and other extruded plastic sheets in Thailand and internationally. The company offers general purpose, impact modified cast, sanitary ware, magic color, and LED block acrylic sheets, as well as light management solutions and acrylic diffusion products. It also provides extruded products, including ABS/HI.PS sheets, HD and LDPE.Net, PMMA and PS pattern, and PVC boards, as well as polypropylene profiles/boards/corrugated sheets under the ComPlas, MODEN PLAS, MAGIC COLOR, MODEN GLAS, and SuperGlas brands. Thai Poly Acrylic Public Company Limited was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Sam Phran, Thailand.

TRUBB-R.BK.long_name: Thai Rubber Latex Group Public Company Limited
TRUBB-R.BK.summary: Thai Rubber Latex Group Public Company Limited manufactures and sells rubber and latex products in Thailand, the People's Republic of China, Islamic Republic of Pakistan, Malaysia, the Republic of Korea, and internationally. It operates through three segments: Concentrated and Prevulcanized Latex; Latex Products; and Rubber Plantation. The company produces and distributes products from natural rubber, rubber threads, and foam latex mattresses and pillows. It also trades in products from natural rubber. The company was formerly known as Thai Rubber Latex Corporation (Thailand) Public Company Limited and changed its name to Thai Rubber Latex Group Public Company Limited in July 2019. Thai Rubber Latex Group Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1985 and is headquartered in Bang Phli, Thailand.

TRUBB.BK.long_name: Thai Rubber Latex Group Public Company Limited
TRUBB.BK.summary: Thai Rubber Latex Group Public Company Limited manufactures and sells rubber and latex products in Thailand, the People's Republic of China, Islamic Republic of Pakistan, Malaysia, the Republic of Korea, and internationally. It operates through three segments: Concentrated and Prevulcanized Latex; Latex Products; and Rubber Plantation. The company produces and distributes products from natural rubber, rubber threads, and foam latex mattresses and pillows. It also trades in products from natural rubber. The company was formerly known as Thai Rubber Latex Corporation (Thailand) Public Company Limited and changed its name to Thai Rubber Latex Group Public Company Limited in July 2019. Thai Rubber Latex Group Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1985 and is headquartered in Bang Phli, Thailand.

UBIS.BK.summary: Ubis (Asia) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes sealing compounds, lacquers, and coatings used in can production and bottle closure for the food, beverage, and general industries in Thailand and internationally. It serves can manufacturers producing food cans, beverage cans, aerosol cans, and other general cans. Ubis (Asia) Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1997 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
